skill_constraints: Over-allocation in Sprints 5, 7, 9. Single points of failure for Frontend, Microservice, and DevOps.
resource_bottlenecks: Senior Odoo developer in early sprints; all resources in Sprints 7 and 9.
mitigation_strategies: Sprint goals must be de-scoped in over-allocated sprints, extending the timeline.

skill_constraints: Adds 1 Full-stack Developer to assist with Odoo backend and OWL frontend.
mitigation_strategies: The additional developer directly addresses over-allocation and the frontend bottleneck.

skill_constraints: Same team, but workload is smoothed out.
mitigation_strategies: Officially split Sprints 5, 7, and 9 into two sprints each, creating a more realistic and sustainable plan.
